column4: Anyone play games on ubuntu? like neverwinter nights? just wondering... lets say I am playing and I want to switch back to the desktop quickly. Does anyone know how I can do this without saving and ending the game?
okay thanks will give it a go
you just have a hotkey to switch to a different desktop - sound will keep running though
Pelo: Yeah no luck with pressing alt tab. actually just highlights my players and gives information about them
